course_description: Learn Python from scratch: variables, loops, functions, and file handling through hands-on projects that turn absolute beginners into confident coders.
course_overview: This beginner-friendly course takes you from zero to writing real Python scripts. You will explore Python syntax, control flow, built-in data structures, functions, error handling, and the standard library. Each module mixes concise video lessons, interactive quizzes, and mini-projects such as a number-guessing game, a CSV analyzer, and a web scraper. By the end you will read and write Python files, debug code with confidence, and be ready for specialized tracks like data science or web development.
target_audience: Absolute beginners aged 14+ with basic computer literacy who want to start coding or automate everyday tasks.
learning_outcomes: Install and configure Python 3 and VS Code on your machine

Construct programs using conditional statements and loops to control execution
Create reusable functions with parameters and return values to modularize code
Manipulate lists, tuples, sets, and dictionaries to store and retrieve data
